newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 30.564 (30.419).
newsitem.headline: Slovak c.bank crown/dollar fix at 30.564 (30.419).

text.p: The National Bank of Slovakia (NBS) fixed the crown at 30.564 to the dollar after Thursday's fixing at 30.419, and at 20.506 to the mark from 20.501.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (0940 GMT), and is within plus/minus 5.0 percent of a dollar/mark basket midpoint calculated at exactly 1130 CET.
The above rates imply no deviation from the midpoint, after a deviation of +0.20 percent on Thursday.
